name: Hoverboard HOGAN
description:
Hoverboard HOGAN

Hoverboard Hogan is a simple retro style tappy game for mobile phones. Game idea is collect maxium points as possible before dead. Notice this is early public build, so there is some bugs and missing features. But in future updates we gonna take all the bugs down, and add new features.

Features

  • Endless gamemode
  • Best score (current device)
  • Automatic effect optimization for lazy phones (for better fps!)
  • Retro style pixel graphics, sounds and music

System requirements

Android 5.0+, Windows Phone or Web Browser (WebGL required).

Todo

  • Shop (double jump hoverboard, hearts)
  • New roadblocks
  • Visual items (buildings, background etc.)
  • Share results in social media
  • ....and planning

How to play?

Collect points by ridin bird's back with your hoverboard and avoid logs and other things coming by the road.

Jump : touch or any button

We hope you like it!
